current_contact.agency: Ofc of the Jackson Cnty Med Exmnr

case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Near complete or complete skeleton
case_circumstances: The subject was found dead in a closet at a vacant home that a crew from Neighborhood United was attempting to clean on 03/26/2012 at 1200. The home had previously been in a fire (while vacant) on 01/02/2012 at 2306 hrs, Incident fire# 2000544. On 01/03/2012 the officials came out to the home and boarded up the doors and windows. Upon my arrival the subject was lying partially in the closest and in a room near the front of the home. Several layers of clothing were observed including shirts and pants. The subject is skeletonized. There are no obvious signs of trauma. It should be noted that various debris such as pieces of drywall and ceiling were observed throughout the home. A neighbor had noted that the home had been vacant for a couple of years and is known to have homeless people go in and out. It should be noted that a gas can was observed in front of the house.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
